arStrings.szText: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Your Skills have up to a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} chance to {c_important}{u}Freeze{/c}{/u} enemies for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds and deal {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} Cold damage to them.
